snippet: John Anagnost joined XplusOne, New York, in a new post, vice president of sales for the Eastern region. He had been president at Reprise Media, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies.
lead_paragraph: John Anagnost joined XplusOne, New York, in a new post, vice president of sales for the Eastern region. He had been president at Reprise Media, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
